TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit ComplexObject extends System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.StructuralObject
Public MustInherit Class ComplexObject Inherits StructuralObject

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作複雜類型的基本功能。 implements the basic functionality for complex types. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[複雜型別物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/34d5c570-a891-42b8-80ae-20e96eedc3af)。For more information, see [Complex Type Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/34d5c570-a891-42b8-80ae-20e96eedc3af). 在實作自訂資料類別，與概念模型時，我們建議您代表複雜類型的資料類別繼承自。When implementing custom data classes with a conceptual model, we recommend that your data classes that represent complex types inherit from . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[自訂物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/af6f07ce-2261-4c65-87cf-d018ad082921)。For more information, see [Customizing Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/af6f07ce-2261-4c65-87cf-d018ad082921). 複雜類型可以是實體類型的屬性或另一個複雜類型的屬性。A complex type can be a property of an entity type or of another complex type. 複雜類型是由實體類型的非純量屬性傳回的。Complex types are returned by non-scalar properties of entity types. 這會讓純量屬性在實體內部組織。This enables scalar properties to be organized within entities. 如同實體，複雜類型包含純量屬性或其他複雜類型屬性。Like entities, complex types consist of scalar properties or other complex type properties. 複雜類型不可在沒有相關實體類型的情況下使用。A complex type cannot be used without an associated entity type. 複雜型別沒有索引鍵，因為無法管理複雜型別物件沒有相關聯的實體類型。Because complex types do not have keys, complex type objects cannot be managed without an associated entity type. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[複雜型別物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/34d5c570-a891-42b8-80ae-20e96eedc3af)。For more information, see [Complex Type Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/34d5c570-a891-42b8-80ae-20e96eedc3af). ## Examples 在下列範例中，自訂資料類別`OrderInfo`繼承自且已對應至`OrderInfo`概念模型中定義的複雜型別。In the following example, the custom data class `OrderInfo` inherits from and is mapped to the `OrderInfo` complex type defined in the conceptual model. [!code-csharp[DP EntityObject Concepts#EntityObject](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP EntityObject Concepts/CS/SalesObjects.cs#entityobject)] [!code-vb[DP EntityObject Concepts#EntityObject](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP EntityObject Concepts/VB/SalesObjects.vb#entityobject)]

span.span: The name of the changed property.

summary.span: 通知變更追蹤程式，複雜物件中的屬性已經改變。

span.span: Notifies the change tracker that a property of a complex object has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當 Entity Data Model 工具產生複雜類型時，屬性變更之後就會呼叫 方法，將 中快取的值認可成該屬性的原始值。When a complex type is generated by the Entity Data Model tools, the method is called after a property change to commit the cached value in the as the original value of the property. 這個方法會在變更追蹤程式中呼叫 方法。This method calls the method in the change tracker. 針對自訂複雜物件的屬性進行追蹤變更時，您必須呼叫 。When tracking changes that are made to the property of a custom complex object, you must call . 當複雜物件繼承自 時，請這樣做。Do this when the complex object inherits from .

.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void ReportPropertyChanging(string property) cil managed
Protected Overrides NotOverridable Sub ReportPropertyChanging (property As String)

span.span: The name of the changing property.

summary.span: 通知變更追蹤程式，複雜物件上的屬性變更處於暫止狀態。

span.span: Notifies the change tracker that a property change is pending on a complex object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當 Entity Data Model 工具產生複雜類型時，會在屬性變更之前呼叫 方法來快取 中該屬性的目前值，讓這個值可以用來當做該屬性的原始值。When a complex type is generated by the Entity Data Model tools, the method is called before a property change to cache the current value of the property in the so that this value can be used as the original value for the property. 這個方法會在變更追蹤程式中呼叫 方法。This method calls the method in the change tracker. 針對自訂複雜物件的屬性進行追蹤變更時，您必須呼叫 。When tracking changes that are made to the property of a custom complex object, you must call . 當複雜物件繼承自 時，請這樣做。Do this when the complex object inherits from .
